verses.roman:
'dvārete vaiṣṇava nāhi'--prabhure kahila
'keha haya' kari' prabhu tāhāre puchila

synonyms: dvārete—at my door; vaiṣṇava nāhi—there is no Vaiṣṇava; prabhure kahila—he informed Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; keha haya—is there anyone; kari'-in this way; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāhāre puchila—inquired from him.
translation: When Candraśekhara informed the Lord that no Vaiṣṇava was at his door, the Lord asked him, "Is there anyone at your door at all?"
